analysis.description:
UTEMIS.fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0xd21daa01e682f849c8e21bd945bc040103091640.sol#259-298) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- amount_actually_invested == 0

UTEMIS.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xd21daa01e682f849c8e21bd945bc040103091640.sol#59-61)
UTEMIS.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xd21daa01e682f849c8e21bd945bc040103091640.sol#58-59)
UTEMIS.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xd21daa01e682f849c8e21bd945bc040103091640.sol#61)
UTEMIS.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/8/0xd21daa01e682f849c8e21bd945bc040103091640.sol#52-53)
